text:
Lakeith Lee Stanfield (born August 12, 1991), sometimes credited as Keith Stanfield, is an American actor, poet and rapper.
He is known for his role as Jimmie Lee Jackson in "Selma" (2014), Snoop Dogg in "Straight Outta Compton" (2015), and Patrick Haynes in "Snowden" (2016).
Since 2016, he has starred as Darius Epps in the FX comedy-drama series "Atlanta".
